abstract: Stocks rose for a second day as a rebound in oil prices set off a late-day rally in energy shares, and a better-than-forecast report on durable goods orders lifted industrial companies.
snippet: Stocks rose for a second day as a rebound in oil prices set off a late-day rally in energy shares, and a better-than-forecast report on durable goods orders lifted industrial companies.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rose for a second day as a rebound in oil prices set off a late-day rally in energy shares, and a better-than-forecast report on durable goods orders lifted industrial companies.

headline.main: STOCKS & BONDS; Increase in Oil Prices Lifts Energy Sector
headline.print_headline: STOCKS & BONDS; Increase in Oil Prices Lifts Energy Sector
